things!\""},{"lineNumber":218675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ、それが我らが魔王の選択ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satella, that is the choice our Demon Lord has made.\""},{"lineNumber":218676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……それは……分かってますけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I understand that, but...\""},{"lineNumber":218677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、でも、ホーネット様も分かってる筈です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, but, Hornet should understand, too."},{"lineNumber":218678,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我慢するからドンドン辛くなるんだって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That by enduring it, it only gets more painful...\""},{"lineNumber":218679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s true...\""},{"lineNumber":218680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時折発散はされるものの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Although he occasionally vents,"},{"lineNumber":218681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王の破壊衝動をここまで抑え込み続けるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"to suppress the Demon Lord’s destructive urges this much,"},{"lineNumber":218682,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのお方の精神力あってのもの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is only possible because of his remarkable willpower...\""},{"lineNumber":218683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おそらくその苦労は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That hardship is probably..."},{"lineNumber":218684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達が想像するそれを","translatedEnglishLine":"far beyond what we can imagine."},{"lineNumber":218685,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遙かに凌駕するでしょう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed, it surpasses it greatly...\""},{"lineNumber":218686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これじゃあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate..."},{"lineNumber":218687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あまりにも魔王様が可哀想だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s just too pitiful for the Demon Lord...\""},{"lineNumber":218688,"originalJapaneseLine":"同情と憐憫、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sympathy and pity,"},{"lineNumber":218689,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして何も出来ない自分自身への無力感は、","translatedEnglishLine":"and a sense of helplessness at being unable to do anything,"},{"lineNumber":218690,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラの中で他方への怒りに変わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"turned inside Satella into anger directed elsewhere."},{"lineNumber":218691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ！　これも、あのリセットとか言う","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right! This, too, is because of that so-called Reset...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにランスの部下である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here are Rance's subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の面々が顔を突き合わせていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon men, gathered face to face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、その場に主の姿だけがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their master was nowhere to be seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんなさい、遅れたかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, am I late?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ……どうやら、いらぬ心配だったようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it seems it was an unnecessary worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、魔王様は今自室にお籠もりに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the Demon Lord is secluded in his room now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も定例会は延期となりそうで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like today's regular meeting will be postponed again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、定例会なんてもうやめたらいいのに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, they might as well stop holding the regular meetings altogether.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までまともに行われた方が少ないんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There have been few that were properly held anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼル、そんな言い方……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Saizel, don’t say it like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、今回はいつもよりもお辛そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But this time, it seems worse than usual...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に誰も入れないなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not allowing anyone into the room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どのような状態か知りたいものですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’d like to know what kind of condition he is in..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それでしたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, if it’s that, then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今ビスケッタさんが様子を伺いに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisucetta is currently checking on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様ですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様の様子を伺う必要なんてない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no need to check on the Demon Lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どーせ、悪いに決まってるんだからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s obviously bad news anyway!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うくっ……だって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このサテラですら部屋から追い出して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Satella was kicked out of his room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、その通りでございました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that is exactly right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、ビスケッタ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, Bisucetta..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昨日はご機嫌も宜しかったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yesterday, he was in good spirits, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はとみにお怒りになられております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, he is especially angry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様、お気になさらなくて宜しいかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Satella, you need not worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様をお嫌いになられたわけでなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s not that he dislikes Lady Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の御主人様は誰であろうと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but whoever he is master to now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋から追い出されるかと存じます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be thrown out of his room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様のことを一番に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the one who understands the Demon Lord best!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理解しているのは、このサテラだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s this Satella!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前に言われるまでもない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t need you to tell me that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ふんっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼致しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My apologies."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタは表情一つ動かさぬまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisucetta bowed deeply without changing her expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深く頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She lowered her head deeply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様も魔王様だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon Lord is just the Demon Lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうして、我慢なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why should he have to endure it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イライラするなら暴れればいいんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he’s frustrated, he should just rampage!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムカつくことがあるなら人を殺せばいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If something pisses him off, he should just kill someone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王というのはこの世界で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon Lord is the most powerful being in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一番偉い存在なのに！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the top authority!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魔王が我慢するなんて聞いたことない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve never heard of a Demon Lord enduring such things!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ、それが我らが魔王の選択ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella, that is the choice our Demon Lord has made."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……それは……分かってますけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I understand that, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、でも、ホーネット様も分かってる筈です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, but, Hornet should understand, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我慢するからドンドン辛くなるんだって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That by enduring it, it only gets more painful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時折発散はされるものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although he occasionally vents,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の破壊衝動をここまで抑え込み続けるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to suppress the Demon Lord’s destructive urges this much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのお方の精神力あってのもの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is only possible because of his remarkable willpower..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おそらくその苦労は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That hardship is probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が想像するそれを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: far beyond what we can imagine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遙かに凌駕するでしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, it surpasses it greatly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これじゃあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりにも魔王様が可哀想だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s just too pitiful for the Demon Lord..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同情と憐憫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sympathy and pity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして何も出来ない自分自身への無力感は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a sense of helplessness at being unable to do anything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの中で他方への怒りに変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turned inside Satella into anger directed elsewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ！　これも、あのリセットとか言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right! This, too, is because of that so-called Reset..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにランスの部下である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here are Rance's subordinates,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の面々が顔を突き合わせていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon men, gathered face to face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、その場に主の姿だけがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their master was nowhere to be seen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんなさい、遅れたかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, am I late?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ……どうやら、いらぬ心配だったようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it seems it was an unnecessary worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、魔王様は今自室にお籠もりに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, the Demon Lord is secluded in his room now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日も定例会は延期となりそうで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like today's regular meeting will be postponed again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、定例会なんてもうやめたらいいのに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, they might as well stop holding the regular meetings altogether.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までまともに行われた方が少ないんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There have been few that were properly held anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼル、そんな言い方……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Saizel, don’t say it like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、今回はいつもよりもお辛そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But this time, it seems worse than usual...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋に誰も入れないなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not allowing anyone into the room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どのような状態か知りたいものですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’d like to know what kind of condition he is in..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それでしたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, if it’s that, then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今ビスケッタさんが様子を伺いに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisucetta is currently checking on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様ですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様の様子を伺う必要なんてない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no need to check on the Demon Lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どーせ、悪いに決まってるんだからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s obviously bad news anyway!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うくっ……だって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このサテラですら部屋から追い出して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Satella was kicked out of his room...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、その通りでございました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that is exactly right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、ビスケッタ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm, Bisucetta..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昨日はご機嫌も宜しかったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yesterday, he was in good spirits, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はとみにお怒りになられております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, he is especially angry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様、お気になさらなくて宜しいかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Satella, you need not worry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様をお嫌いになられたわけでなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s not that he dislikes Lady Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の御主人様は誰であろうと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but whoever he is master to now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋から追い出されるかと存じます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be thrown out of his room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様のことを一番に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am the one who understands the Demon Lord best!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理解しているのは、このサテラだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s this Satella!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前に言われるまでもない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t need you to tell me that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ふんっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼致しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My apologies."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタは表情一つ動かさぬまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisucetta bowed deeply without changing her expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深く頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She lowered her head deeply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様も魔王様だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon Lord is just the Demon Lord!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうして、我慢なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why should he have to endure it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イライラするなら暴れればいいんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he’s frustrated, he should just rampage!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムカつくことがあるなら人を殺せばいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If something pisses him off, he should just kill someone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王というのはこの世界で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon Lord is the most powerful being in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一番偉い存在なのに！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the top authority!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その魔王が我慢するなんて聞いたことない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ve never heard of a Demon Lord enduring such things!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ、それが我らが魔王の選択ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella, that is the choice our Demon Lord has made."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……それは……分かってますけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I understand that, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、でも、ホーネット様も分かってる筈です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, but, Hornet should understand, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我慢するからドンドン辛くなるんだって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That by enduring it, it only gets more painful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時折発散はされるものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although he occasionally vents,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の破壊衝動をここまで抑え込み続けるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to suppress the Demon Lord’s destructive urges this much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのお方の精神力あってのもの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is only possible because of his remarkable willpower..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おそらくその苦労は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That hardship is probably...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が想像するそれを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: far beyond what we can imagine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遙かに凌駕するでしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, it surpasses it greatly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これじゃあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりにも魔王様が可哀想だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s just too pitiful for the Demon Lord..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同情と憐憫、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sympathy and pity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして何も出来ない自分自身への無力感は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a sense of helplessness at being unable to do anything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの中で他方への怒りに変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: turned inside Satella into anger directed elsewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ！　これも、あのリセットとか言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right! This, too, is because of that so-called Reset..."
